name: Vertigo (itch) (Deliciouzlp)
description:
A green glow illuminates the streets. The air tastes stale. Countless factories are posining the sky. Make your way across the rooftops of the City Valita and save your home!

Vertigo is a trippy 3D Platformer. You play as Nero and live in a city poisoned by factories. You try to save your home by stealing supplies needed for a cure. But the chemicals keeping you upright come with strong side effects, which increase over time.


This Game is a Demo Version. There is no full release planned....yet.

Platforming

Awesome Soundtrack

Controller Support

Cool Graffitis

Hallucinations

Chaxs

Loki+LPunicorn

Schnoeh

Unreal Engine 5

Blender

FMOD

Reaper

Photoshop

Epidemic Sounds

This game may cause motion sickness. Distortion effects can be disabled in the settings.
